company.description: I working as a Senior Frontend Nextjs Developer at TOT Platform, where I specialize in building high-performance, user-friendly web applications using React.js and modern frontend technologies. At TOT Platform, we focus on delivering cutting-edge digital solutions that enhance user experiences and streamline business operations. My role involves developing interactive and scalable web applications, designing reusable UI components, and optimizing application performance for a seamless user experience. With extensive experience in Next.js, Redux, and Zustand, I ensure clean, maintainable code by following best practices in functional programming and clean architecture. Additionally, I work on API integrations, server-side rendering (SSR), and static site generation (SSG) to enhance application efficiency. I am passionate about continuous learning and leveraging the latest technologies to build innovative and high-quality digital products that meet user expectations.
